import { ClientRequest } from 'http' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { MoneyProps } from '../types/money' import { Box, TextField } from '@mui/material' const Money = ({option, list, setList}: MoneyProps) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState("") const [amount, setAmount] = useState(0) const [date, setDate] = useState("") const onSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() setList([{amount, date, title, id: Date.now() }, ...list]) } return (
onSubmit(e)}>
setTitle(e.target.value)} />
setAmount(Number(e.target.value))}/>
setDate(e.target.value)}/>
    { list.length > 0 && list.map( item => (
  • {item.title} , {item.amount} , {item.date}
    • ) ) }
) } export default Money
